cast.overview: Two mismatched entrepreneurs – egghead innovator Mike Lazaridis and cut-throat businessman Jim Balsillie – joined forces in an endeavour that was to become a worldwide hit in little more than a decade. The story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone.
cast.title: BlackBerry

details.biography:
Lauren Howe is a Canadian television personality, Miss Universe Canada 2017, producer, actress and model. She competed at the Miss Universe 2017 pageant and placed in the top 10 at The AXIS, Las Vegas, Nevada on November 26, 2017.

Lauren is currently a correspondent for Citytv in Toronto, Ontario, predominantly for CityLine and Breakfast Television. She co-hosted the Canadian Broadcast Coverage of the 61st Annual Grammy Awards with Tracy Moore and Devo Brown.
details.name: Lauren Howe
